Make every training comfortable and stylish with the Kick Boxing Hand Wraps. These awesome wraps provide full support for your wrists while protecting your knuckles underneath.

  • Material: Cotton & Polyester
  • Length: 5M
  • Package includes one pair of boxing hand wraps and one polybag
  • Easy wrapping: Hook & Loop Closure helps you to easily wrap your hands and solidly hold the position.
  • Breathable and Fast Drying: Moisture can, and will, ruin hand wraps. Our polyester material keeps your hands cooler during training and your wraps will dry faster until you can get them washed
  • Designed to Endure: Our 180" wraps are semi-elastic and highly durable, so they won’t come to lose just from putting on your gloves. They’ll also retain their shape better over time
  • Ideal for professionals or beginners for boxing, kickboxing, muay thai, and MMA.

entry.title: Custom Boxing/MMA Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: custom
Price: 75.00 - 80.00 (8 variants)

FOR CUSTOM RASH GUARD BULK ORDER: Contact us to get discounted quote!

* YOU CAN CHOOSE ANY COLOR AND ADD LOGO ON TO THE GLOVES

* FOR FULL DESIGN - MINIMUM QUANTITY OF 30 PCS

Note: Please be aware of production and processing time takes 5-6 weeks for custom print

After placing an order, reply to our email confirmation with your custom design logo in high quality transparent file that can be a vector or PDF. Please include a basic sketch for the positioning of your design. 

STRICTLY NO CANCELLATION/REFUND/RETURN ONCE DESIGN ARE CONFIRMED.

Custom Boxing Gloves is a perfect way to personalize your boxing gloves which can be used for boxing, Muay Thai and MMA training. We want your order to be made just the way you want it! Make your own customized boxing gloves by adding your own design. 

WHY XMARTIAL CUSTOM BOXING GLOVES?

  • PREMIUM QUALITY: Crafted from the finest quality full leather custom boxing gloves and constructed with care to endure through years of use in the toughest Muay Thai, Boxing, and MMA gyms in the world
  • WRIST SUPPORT: The padded wrist of the boxing glove, with its integrated Velcro-wrist strap, helps hold the wrist steady and guard against impact from kicks and punch.
  • COMFORTABLE FIT: Weight suggested by professional trainers: Available in 12- or 14-ounce weight sizes; Anti-microbial treatment fights offensive odors and bacterial growth.
